languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает в невольном изумлении.{/n} "Гниющия сердцевина рождает погибель целого. Теперь я вижу, откуда произрастает уродливая сущность твоих слуг. Нам нет смысла и дальше обсуждать случившееся".

{n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт замирает в невольном изумлении.{/n} "Гниющия сердцевина рождает погибель целого. Теперь я вижу, откуда произрастает уродливая сущность твоих слуг. Нам нет смысла и дальше обсуждать случившееся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet freezes, surprised involuntary.{/n} "The rotting core spells the end for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your subjects comes from. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特吃了一惊，不由得愣住了。{/n}“上梁不正下梁歪，我现在知道你那些粗鄙的仆人都是和谁学的这一套了。继续和你讨论这个问题，看来毫无意义。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特吃了一惊，不由得愣住了。{/n}“上梁不正下梁歪，我现在知道你那些粗鄙的仆人都是和谁学的这一套了。继续和你讨论这个问题，看来毫无意义。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se queda paralizada por la sorpresa.{/n} «Si el corazón está podrido, nada bueno le espera al resto del cuerpo. Ahora veo de dónde proviene la vulgaridad de tus sirvientes. De poco servirá discutir contigo de este asunto».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se queda paralizada por la sorpresa.{/n} «Si el corazón está podrido, nada bueno le espera al resto del cuerpo. Ahora veo de dónde proviene la vulgaridad de tus sirvientes. De poco servirá discutir contigo de este asunto».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet se fige sous le coup de la surprise.{/n} « Un cœur pourri condamne le reste du fruit. Je comprends maintenant d'où vient la nature nocive de vos serviteurs. Je pense que le sujet est clos. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet se fige sous le coup de la surprise.{/n} « Un cœur pourri condamne le reste du fruit. Je comprends maintenant d'où vient la nature nocive de vos serviteurs. Je pense que le sujet est clos. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet erstarrt unfreiwillig vor Überraschung.{/n} "Der faule Kern bedeutet den Untergang für das Ganze. Jetzt verstehe ich, woher die hässliche Natur Eurer Diener stammt. Es ist sinnlos, weiter mit Euch darüber zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet erstarrt unfreiwillig vor Überraschung.{/n} "Der faule Kern bedeutet den Untergang für das Ganze. Jetzt verstehe ich, woher die hässliche Natur Eurer Diener stammt. Es ist sinnlos, weiter mit Euch darüber zu sprechen."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは予想外の驚きに固まる。{/n}「腐ったコアは全体に破滅を及ぼす。今、お前の従者どもの醜い性質がどこから来ているのかわかった。これ以上お前と議論しても意味がなさそうだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは予想外の驚きに固まる。{/n}「腐ったコアは全体に破滅を及ぼす。今、お前の従者どもの醜い性質がどこから来ているのかわかった。これ以上お前と議論しても意味がなさそうだ」

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, gayriihtiyari şaşırarak kalakalıyor.{/n} "Çekirdeği çürüyen meyvenin dışı gelişmez. Hizmetkârlarının çirkin doğasının nereden geldiğini şimdi anladım. Daha fazla konuşmanın anlamı yok."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet freezes in involuntary surprise.{/n} "The rotting core spells doom for the whole. Now I can see where the ugly nature of your servants originates. There is no sense in discussing this with you any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet, gayriihtiyari şaşırarak kalakalıyor.{/n} "Çekirdeği çürüyen meyvenin dışı gelişmez. Hizmetkârlarının çirkin doğasının nereden geldiğini şimdi anladım. Daha fazla tartışmamıza gerek yok."
